label: Phil of Law and of the State
description: Examination of issues in the philosophy of law, such as the nature of law, law and morality, justice, liberty and authority, punishment, and legal responsibility. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 or 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: One course in philosophy.
courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 or 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: One course in philosophy.
